<h4>Description</h4>
Claudin-18, isoform 2 ([CLDN18.2](https://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/P56856)). Plays a major role in tight junction-specific obliteration of the intercellular space, through calcium-independent cell-adhesion activity.

<br> 

<h4>Clinical trials</h4> 
[NCT04404595](https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT04404595) - Pancreatic Cancer <br>
[NCT03159819](https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT03159819) - Pancreatic Cancer
